Package edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.pong.logic

Provides a PaddleLogic class which can be extended in order to make a artificial intelligence controller for a Paddle object.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Keyboard Extends the PaddleLogic class to create an keyboard-controlled paddle logic unit.
PaddleLogic Extends the PlayerLogic class in order to provide a framework with which developers may create logical instructions for their pong paddles.
Wobbly Extends the PaddleLogic class to create an artificial intelligence that tells a paddle to follow the height of the ball, with a persistent wobble added through a call to the random method of the Math class.
 

Package edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.pong.logic Description

Provides a PaddleLogic class which can be extended in order to make a artificial intelligence controller for a Paddle object. Also includes a Wobbly intelligence class by default.
